name: association_result_annotation
title: Annotate GWAS, PheWAS Associations
summary: This app increases the depth of annotation information in an input GWAS tsv file.

details.whatsNew: *1.0.0: updated to ubuntu 14.04, added patterns/help to input/output spec, added regionalOptions/assetDepends;

inputSpec.name: associations
inputSpec.label: Input Assocaition File
inputSpec.help: A data file containing information from a genome wide association catalog.

inputSpec.name: icd9_desc
inputSpec.label: Do you want to add ICD-9 descriptions?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Allows to add ICD-9 code long descriptions to the output.

inputSpec.name: icd9_col
inputSpec.label: Which column in the input file contains ICD-9 codes?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Indicates the column name in input file containing ICD-9 codes. It is required if icd9_desc is set to true.

inputSpec.name: ebi_gwas
inputSpec.label: Do you want to add traits found in the the EBI GWAS catalog?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Add traits found in EBI GWAS catalog for SNPs position in input file.

inputSpec.name: grasp
inputSpec.label: Do you want to add traits found in the GRASP GWAS catalog for SNPs in the input file?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) GRASP has more thorough list of published GWAS results but it also include results with p-value < 0.01 and that makes it a bigger database than EBI.

inputSpec.name: grasp_pval
inputSpec.label: GRASP p-value threshold
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Because GRASP reports association from known GWAS with pvalue < 0.01, we suggest to use a lower significance (<1E-05) to reduce result lookup.

inputSpec.name: or_val
inputSpec.label: Do you want to calculate the odds ratio from the beta and standard error in the input file?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) odds ratio and confidence interval calculated from the beta and standard error.

inputSpec.name: case_control_num
inputSpec.label: Do you want to include case-control numbers in the output file?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Listing case-control numbers only works with output from PLATO.

inputSpec.name: gene
inputSpec.label: Do you want to map genes to chromosome-basepair positions from the input data?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Map gene to chromosome-basepair position in input file.

inputSpec.name: up_gene
inputSpec.label: Do you want to map upstream genes to chromosome-basepair position in the input file and provide the distances to the SNPs?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Maps upstream genes to chromosome-basepair position in input file and provides distances to SNPs.

inputSpec.name: down_gene
inputSpec.label: Do you want to map downstream genes to chromosome-basepair positions in the input file and provide distances to the SNPs?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Maps downstream genes to chromosome-basepair position in the input file and provides distances to SNPs.

inputSpec.name: chr_col
inputSpec.label: Which column name contains the chromosome numbers in the input file?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) It is required if any of the option in Gene and GWAS Catalog is true. It allows app to know which column in input file contain chromosome numbers. In case of PLATO association results output, just enter 'Var1_Pos'.

inputSpec.name: pos_col
inputSpec.label: Which column name contains the basepair postion of a SNP in the input file?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) It is required if any of the option in Gene and GWAS Catalog is true. It allows app to know which column in input file contain basepair position. In case of PLATO association results output, just enter 'Var1_Pos'.

outputSpec.name: output_tsv
outputSpec.label: Output TSV
outputSpec.help: The output file contains columns from the input file with additional columns requested for annotation.
